sentences: Karl Denson (born December 27, 1956) is an American funk and jazz saxophonist, flutist and vocalist from Santa Ana, California.
He continues to lead his own Karl Denson's Tiny Universe (KDTU) and Karl Denson Trio (KD3), while touring with the Rolling Stones since 2014 to date.
Denson appears in the 1988 movie Coming To America as the saxophonist in the fictional band Sexual Chocolate.
